SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(co.school_payment_date, '%Y-%m') AS date,
DATE_FORMAT(co.school_payment_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date,
DATE_FORMAT(co.kj_approval_date, '%Y-%m') AS date,
DATE_FORMAT(co.kj_approval_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date,
r.id AS regionId, r.name AS area, a.id AS adviserId, a.name AS consultant, SUM(IF(co.is_settle = true, co.sure_expect_amount, 0)) AS deductionCommission, SUM(IF(co.is_settle = false, co.expect_amount, 0)) AS claimCommission, SUM(IF(co.commission_state = 'YZY', co.expect_amount, 0)) AS claimedCommission FROM b_commission_order co, tb_adviser a, tb_region r WHERE a.region_id = r.id AND co.adviser_id = a.id
AND co.kj_approval_date > #{startDate} AND co.kj_approval_date < #{endDate}
AND r.id = #{regionId}
AND a.id = #{adviserId}
GROUP BY
DATE_FORMAT(co.school_payment_date, '%Y-%m'),
DATE_FORMAT(co.school_payment_date, '%Y-%m-%d'),
DATE_FORMAT(co.kj_approval_date, '%Y-%m'),
DATE_FORMAT(co.kj_approval_date, '%Y-%m-%d'),
adviser_id ORDER BY co.kj_approval_date DESC;
